name: Manual Tester - Khối CNTT
description:

  • Kỹ năng phân tích tài liệu, yêu cầu, báo cáo, viết tài liệu tốt
  • Kỹ năng tư duy/logic tốt, giao tiếp, thuyết trình, thuyết phục
  • Tiếng Anh tốt, có thể làm việc trực tiếp với các đối tác nước ngoài là một lợi thế

  • Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện, cởi mở.
  • Được làm việc với các hệ thống hiện đại, tiên tiến nhất thị trường, áp dụng các công nghệ hàng đầu về an ninh bảo mật để đảm bảo an toàn cho người sử dụng.
  • Cơ hội học hỏi nghiệp vụ ngân hàng.

name: eCommerce Project Manager/Tester (Magento)
description:
Mô Tả Công Việc


About Digital Outlook

  • Digital Outlook is a strategy, user experience and development agency with a focus on creating engaging brand experiences that convert.
  • We work as partners with local and global brands based in Australia spanning services such as eCommerce, B2B, retail and consumer industries to deliver products, services, platforms and solutions that people love to use across multi channels.
  • With our head office based in Melbourne (Australia), our Hanoi office is a critical part of the business, with a highly experienced and dedicated team responsible for the technical scoping, delivery and maintenance of all of our projects.
  • Digital Outlook is set-up as a registered office in Vietnam, with all staff paid via payroll and local taxes, insurances allocated each quarter and a summer holiday for all employees.


The Position

  • A unique opportunity for an experienced Magento Project Manager/Tester to join the Digital Outlook team and work directly with a large Australian customer, as a dedicated member of their team.            
  • Based in our Hanoi office, you will act as a remote resource and report directly to the Melbourne Head Office of the retailer, while being supported by the development team at the Hanoi Digital Outlook office.
  • The role will assist in the successful delivery of all eCommerce projects both B2B and B2C, as well as any ongoing website maintenance across at least three Adobe Commerce websites. You will be the first point of contact for the retail group and facilitate and manage the various website requirements through the Digital Outlook team.
  • The position requires a clear understanding of the Adobe Commerce platform and eCommerce operations. The role will assist in general problem solving, raising Jira tickets and be an overall systems expert when it comes to the Adobe Commerce platform.
  • You will have strong written communication and organisational skills and will be responsible for maintaining, closing and the escalation of Jira tickets to the Digital Outlook development team.
  • The position requires a clear understanding of our clients businesses, goals and problems and of the technologies that their websites are built on.


Yêu Cầu Công Việc


Project Management/Testing Requirements

  • You’ll be the main point of contact between the retailer and the development team at Digital Outlook, taking briefs and managing all development work on the Adobe Commerce platforms
  • Day-to-day management of the websites, assisting the retailer with common tasks such as product and content updates, setting up campaigns and promotions and general configurations
  • Ensure projects are carried out in accordance with our development methodology
  • Ensure the appropriate people are resourced on your projects
  • As the primary tester, effectively troubleshoot issues, determining the cause and managing the resolution process with the client and internal team (if required) 
  • Writing training documentation and facilitating client training sessions
  • Accounting for your time and accurately completing your timesheets
  • Demonstrate an interest in current technology and future trends


Your Skills

  • A minimum of three years of experience with Magento 2/Adobe Commerce in a Project Management and Testing capacity
  • Ability to juggle multiple projects and clients
  • Ability to accurately estimate, manage and measure projects
  • Ability to work well under pressure, solve problems, manage workflows and meet deadlines
  • Demonstrated high level written and verbal communication skills in English
  • A positive and honest attitude


Tại Sao Bạn Sẽ Yêu Thích Làm Việc Tại Đây

Why You'll Love Working Here

  • Extremely Attractive Salary
  • No overtime
  • Join a young, passionate, energetic team with friendly colleagues
  • Opportunities to improve English within an international team
  • High health insurance package 
  • Offer training & English courses
  • Vacation, team building events, bonus

name: Remote Sr Front-End Dev (TypeScript, ReactJS, English)
description:
3 Lý Do Để Gia Nhập Công Ty

  • Exciting and Diverse Projects
  • Collaborative and Supportive Team Environment
  • Personal and Professional Growth


Mô Tả Công Việc

At Avalon Innovations, we are the creative minds behind cutting-edge web applications and digital products that serve a diverse range of industries, including e-commerce, insurance, travel, education, and healthcare. Based in Australia, we have a global reach, with our team members working remotely across various continents.

We are now on the lookout for seasoned Front-End Developers who are excited about the prospect of leveraging their skills on a diverse portfolio of global projects.


● Collaborate in the development, planning, and evaluation of technical tasks.

● Engage closely with our dynamic team and global clients.

● Develop and maintain client projects employing technologies such as React, Next.js, Shopify, TypeScript, and Node.js.

● Design and implement components aligning with the best industry practices and accessibility principles.

● Serve as a mentor and support for junior and intermediate developers.

● Contribute to our rigorous code review processes, helping to maintain high standards of code quality.


Yêu Cầu Công Việc

What We Need from You:

● Proficiency in spoken and written English (B2+).

● A minimum of 3 years of experience in front-end development, including a senior role.

● An ability to write clean, maintainable code comprehensible to other developers.

● In-depth understanding of TypeScript, React (Redux), and Next.js.

● Experience working with REST and GraphQL API protocols.

● Proficiency with Git and practical experience with CI / CD setups.

● Familiarity with Agile methodologies, with proficiency in Jira.

● Proven expertise in creating pixel-perfect layouts using SCSS and CSS-in-JS (emotion or styled-components).

● Experience in testing React components using Jest and Cypress.

● Knowledge of and experience implementing accessibility standards in development.

● Experience in developing services with Node.js, Express.js / Nest.js.

● Comfortability working with Linux systems and experience with Docker containers.


Nice-to-have:

● Experience with AWS services (S3, Lambda, ECS...).

● Proficiency with design systems and tools such as Figma / Adobe XD / Sketch.

● Experience with Shopify or similar e-commerce systems.

● Familiarity with Contentful / Sanity or similar headless content-management systems.


Tại Sao Bạn Sẽ Yêu Thích Làm Việc Tại Đây

Why Choose Avalon Innovations?


● Work remotely in a distributed team - join us from anywhere in the world.

● Enjoy flexible scheduling for an optimal work-life balance.

● Practice and improve your English language skills in an international team.

● Benefit from paid professional training in modern front-end technologies.

● Enjoy 20 paid vacation days per year.

● Gain experience working with renowned international companies such as Toyota, Atlassian, Flight Centre, and Accenture.

● Get paid twice a month in USD, with salary reviews every 6 months.

name: Mid/Sr Frontend Developer (ReactJS, TypeScript)
description:

Mô Tả Công Việc

  • Hơn 1 năm kinh nghiệm phát triển frontend, sử dụng TypeScript. 
  • Có kinh nghiệm phát triển responsive websites, sử dụng thư viện UI (Ant Design, Material UI, Chakra UI) và CSS Preprocessor (SCSS, LESS) 
  • Có kinh nghiệm viết unit tests và integration tests, sở hữu tư duy kiểm thử + kỹ thuật kiểm thử tốt (Jest, testing-library, Cypress, Detox).

  • Thành thạo các thư viện về quản lý chất lượng code (ESLint, Prettier). 
  • Chú trọng vào tiểu tiết khi bố cục thành phần trên web. 
  • Có khả năng chuyển hóa thiết kế wireframes (Figma) thành semantic HTML. 
  • Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng Agile/Scrum, hiểu rõ nguyên lý về Agile. 
  • Nhiệt tình, thân thiện, cộng tác với các team khác như BA/BE/QC. 
  • Có khả năng đa nhiệm, làm việc độc lập, hỗ trợ thành viên khác thực hiện code reviews. 


Khuyến khích có: 

  • Có kinh nghiệm với các framework React: Next.js, Expo (native apps). 
  • Có kinh nghiệm phát triển Backend (Firebase, Amplify, Java) 
  • Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng CI/CD pipeline (Jenkins, Docker) 
  • Có kiến thức vềdịch vụcloud (GCP, AWS)


Tại Sao Bạn Sẽ Yêu Thích Làm Việc Tại Đây
